tips.Description: Adults should perform at least 150–300 min/wk of moderate-intensity, 75–150 min/wk of vigorous-intensity. Additional health benefits are gained by engaging 300 minutes (5 hours) of moderate-intensity physical activity per week.

Adults should also perform muscle-strengthening exercises of moderate or greater intensity that involve all major muscle groups on 2 or more days a week, as these activities provide additional health benefits.
Balance training and fall prevention exercises should be performed more than 3 times a week
Regular physical activity is crucial to maintaining health and preventing cardiovascular disease complications.
Physical activity reduces mortality, prevents various cancers such as colon, breast,endometrial, stomach, etc
Physical activity controls hypertension, diabetes, and dyslipidemia, thereby preventing cerebrovascular disease. It also improves obesity and insulin resistance.
Physical activity prevent osteoporosis, reduce fractures, and improve the function of patients with rheumatoid and degenerative arthritis.
Physical activity have been proven in depression, anxiety, stress, sleep, dementia, and psychological well-being.
Physical activity increases levels of energy and improve daily productivity
Don't try to do too much at the beginning, start little by little and increase the intensity and time
It is important to set realistic and specific goals
Performing physical activity will be easier if you find an activity that you enjoy and that motivates you, so explore as many as you can
Rest is also very important to improve your health and habits, listen to your body and rest when necessary.

notes.Description: If you suffer from any illness or have any problems, consult your doctor to avoid possible problems due to intense activity or undiagnosed illnesses.
